name: Q1
text: 1. What time did you get into bed? (This may not be the time that you began “trying” to fall asleep.)

name: Q2
text: 2. What time did you wake up this morning?

name: Q3
text: 3. Sometimes people take a while to fall asleep or wake up in the middle of the night. How many hours did you actually sleep last night? (Your best estimate is fine.)

name: Q4
text: 4. Last night, how well did you sleep?

name: Q5
text: 5. Did you have difficulty falling or staying asleep?
